about.title: About Me
about.content:
I connect large-scale operations with advanced AI solutions. After managing 300+ team members from China, the Philippines, Malaysia, and Vietnam at Topvan Group, I founded ThinkerCafe to democratize AI education and business automation.

My unique background combines international team leadership, deep AI/Data Science expertise, and 10+ years of teaching experience. I don't just implement AI solutionsâ€”I build systems that empower people to work smarter.

Currently seeking opportunities to bring this combined expertise to enterprise AI consulting and digital transformation projects.

jobs.title: CEO & Founder
points: Lead a distributed US-Taiwan team developing AI education and automation products
Designed comprehensive AI courses (Personal OS, AI Communication, Visual/System Hacking series)
Built LINE Bot, automation systems, and AI productivity tools
Provide AI solutions and workflow optimization consulting for businesses

jobs.title: Operations Manager
points: Directly led a team of 10-12, indirectly managed 300+ members from China, the Philippines, Malaysia, and Vietnam
International assignments: Dubai Business Bay (4 months), Clark, Philippines (1.5 years), Makati/BGC (1 year)
Enhanced data-driven decision-making using Python and the Telegram Bot API
Managed all operations except finance and retail, reporting directly to the Chairman

jobs.title: R&D Department Manager
points: Rebuilt the team: recruited new talent and reformed performance evaluations after 50%+ employee turnover
Implemented Scrum development processes and internal/external testing environments
Developed an operations anomaly reporting system, automating processes using JIRA
Resolved iOS certificate issues and IP blocking issues for custom applications

jobs.title: Data Science Department Head
points: Built the Data Science department from the ground up
Established a complete environment within one month: Linux, Python, Docker, Jupyter, RStudio
Predicted player churn and implemented retention strategies
Detected arbitrage players and compiled quarterly operations reports

jobs.title: Founder
points: Freelance company that built part-time teams based on project needs
Sanlih E-Television Vidol: developed a web drama recommendation system
Chunghwa Telecom: provided big data Hadoop cluster consulting and maintenance
E.Sun Bank: implemented a cross-device member attribution mechanism
Industrial Technology Research Institute (ITRI): analyzed industry talent competency assessments and international corporate job postings

jobs.title: Big Data Technology R&D Engineer
points: Designed data collection processes and ETL pipelines
Used statistical methods for data analysis and to support decision-making
Dietary semantic analysis for patients with diseases: built an emotion lexicon, developed a scoring model, and automatically reported the top 5 recommended/avoided foods for each disease

philosophy.title: Technical Philosophy
philosophy.content: I don't focus on "how many languages I know," but rather "how quickly I can solve problems." In the age of AI collaboration, the key is not to hand-write every line of code, but to: 1) Know which combination of tools to use 2) Be able to design a maintainable system architecture 3) Understand how to make AI your development partner
